concept.title: SDC RPC
concept.shortdesc: The SDC RPC origin enables connectivity between two SDC RPC pipelines. The SDC RPC origin reads data passed from an SDC RPC destination. Use the SDC RPC origin as part of an SDC RPC destination pipeline.

conbody.p: originsSDC RPCSDC RPC originsoverviewYou can use SDC RPC pipelines across a single Data Collector instance on a single machine, or across a local network or the public internet to a remote Data Collector. You can configure the origin to use encryption for secure connectivity.
When you configure the SDC RPC origin, you define the port that the origin listens to for data. The port number must be specified in one of the RPC connections defined in the SDC RPC destination.
Similarly, the RPC ID in the SDC RPC origin must match the RPC ID used in the SDC RPC destination.
